member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Security.SecurityModule.Setup(DevExpress.ExpressApp.XafApplication)

summary.para: Configures the XAF application to operate with the Security module.

member.param: An object that manages an XAF application.

summary.para: Specifies whether to throw a user-friendly exception when a prohibited operation is executed in an Object Space (see ). The default value is true. If you set this field to false, then the Security System will not prohibit object manipulations performed in your custom code.
For internal use.
